clues.text: Like monkeys & squirrels, the coconut crab is able to do this in search of food

From Old German "to patch", this type of stitch is used to hold pieces of fabric together temporarily
Parts of one include the teeth, tab, & top-stop

rounds.comments: (Alex: We will give you the characters.  You have to identify the play, of course.)

a Scottish doctor, &
some apparitions

the Lieutenant of the Tower, &
the ghosts of the title character's victims

rounds.text: In office from 2022, the president of this country has taken so many foreign trips a play on his name is "Ferdinand Magellan Jr."
